name: Mediterranean Tuna-Pasta Salad
author: Jrocks
summary: Light and easy for weeknights. We like garlic so adjust yours accordingly.
ingredients: ½ (12 ounce) box dry fettuccine pasta
1 (12 ounce) can albacore tuna in water, drained and flaked
⅓ cup thinly sliced red onion
directions: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil
Cook fettuccine at a boil until tender yet firm to the bite, about 8 minutes
Rinse under cold water and drain
Place pasta in a large bowl; add tuna, tomatoes, red onion, and olives
Combine vinegar, garlic, oil, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper in a jar with a tight-fitting lid; shake vinaigrette well
Pour over salad and toss to coat
Cover and refrigerate for 1 to 2 hours
